attributes.action: legalise marijuana and all its bi-products  for recreational use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: basically a petition that means you can buy, smoke and cook marijuana legally without having to look over your back continously on the lookout for the police. many countries have legalised cannabis use and that is an obvious sign that the world is gradually accepting it and it should be legalised

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
